topics.body: One of my biggest fears about Captain America: Civil War is that it'll do the thing the comic line was bad about and try to play the middle ground. The fact that The Winter Soldier film DIDN'T do that is what makes it so great. It brings up the question "Is it okay to sacrifice individual freedoms in the name of security". And the movie gives a clear and concise answer. No. When you bring up a heavy issue in your narrative you need to choose an answer to that issue.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
